details.p: These are the prerequisite libraries and tools needed to build and/or run WebScarab. Since bad experiences where made with disappearing packages that one relies on, a copy of all prerequisite libraries and tools is provided under CVS. If you want to spare download time or if you are unwilling to build these libs from scratch, or if you have already some of the packages installed on your system, you may use the optlib.jar that can be found under the cvs module 'extern'. It contains all needed things in a bundle.
Your System must contain a working java jdk 1.4 available at http://java.sun.com.
You will need no additional binaries, since the building environment is based upon ant, a completely java-based build tool.
In addition you will have to install either all of the following packages with the given releases or put our optlib.jar in your java CLASSPATH.

tr.td: junit add-on for performance and load testing
dependency checker for java package structure, also contains an ant interface
You may use the plain argo instead of poseidon if you prefer to use a completely GPLd development environment
commercial argo extension, free community edition (CE)
If you use poseidon, you can spare argo installation since poseidon already ships with a complete argo distribution
